page.title: 09A day of a farmer's daughter
page.content: Every weekend Natasha Grant from Boreland of Kelton gets up at around 9.30 pm. As soon as she gets up she usually helps her mother around the house and also her father on the farm, such as feeding the animals etc. Usually family outings can be quite difficult in getting as the family work very hard most of the time. She enjoys working on the farm very much and has decided to work on the farm when she is older. As she is so busy most of the time she only gets into Gelston sometimes to meet her friends. She gets to school in the car, it is about 2 miles away from Gelston. In her leisure time she enjoys watching television.
